summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2666, for the improvement of Lander Street from 1st Avenue South to Colorado Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by filling and planking a roadway 16 feet in width with the necessary approaches; by the construction of wooden curbs, gutters and wood sidewalks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31377 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
